name: Pawn Escape
description:
Description: made for jamDNA13 art by Tundenizer programing by Kuglepanzer

Controls: left mouse button clicking on the square next to the player moves the player 1 square and clicking 2 squares away jumps the player.

Criteria:

-Stealth 1: the player is sneaking to pick up the keys and if the enemy bumps into him or the light falls on him he looses.

-Jump 2: in the game, jumping is a special move that has to be used strategically.

-Purple 3: it in the art style of the game and has a role in the narrative/lore of the game.

-Wham! sound 4: the sound effects are done in an over exaggerate fashion.

Credits:

the font in the game is by: Fonts For Flash

https://www.1001fonts.com/fff-forward-font.html
